page.title: 17Sporting Facilities.
page.content: In Crawford we have quite a few sports facilities.There is indoor and outdoor bowling,badminton,tennis,fishing and football.This year the tennis court opens for the first time.The football pitch has recently been completed as well.We would very much like our own swimming pool,but enjoy the use of Lanark Baths(20 miles)away when we can get there. During Gala Day various sporting events take place.There is a raft race on the Clyde,a mini marathon,a sports night,and a football competition. At school we play netball and football and sometimes take part in competitions against other schools. In the summer we have a school sports afternoon.We also take part in the Upperward Sports for schools.We have won our section for the last three years.
